mapper.update: update mrm_committee set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, type_no = #{typeNo,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, mrm_township_id = #{mrmTownshipId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, code, type_id, type_no, mrm_township_id from mrm_committee
select IFNULL(max(type_no), 0) as typeNo from mrm_committee where type_id = #{typeId} and mrm_township_id = #{mrmTownshipId}

select * from view_mrm_committee
(mrmTownshipName like '${mrmTownshipName}%' or mrmTownshipCode like '${mrmTownshipName}%') and
(name like '${name}%' or code like '${name}%') and
order by id desc

SELECT 0 as maxIndex, a.type_no AS committeeNo, b.type_no AS townshipNo, c.area_id AS areaNo FROM mrm_committee a LEFT JOIN mrm_township b ON a.mrm_township_id = b.id LEFT JOIN sys_location c ON b.sys_location_id = c.id where a.id = #{id}
